form.question: Will any part of the service(s) be outsourced by Company to third parties?

child_questions.question: Please outline the nature of outsourced services, the name and location of third parties.

form.question: Does Company currently appear (or appeared in the past) on any international, regional, local government authority, criminal, regulatory or enforcement activity databases?
Please list the full names of all Company's Directors and Shareholders, (to ultimate controlling parent).
Please provide details of any technical or specialist expertise required to perform the services including details of experience or any relevant accreditations.
Will any part of the fee paid to Company by FT be paid directly to any official or employee of a government, political party, party official, political candidate or public sector employee?
Are any Directors or officials of the Company listed as PEPâ€™s?
form.prompt: Politically Exposed Persons: Defined by  HYPERLINK "http://www.fatf-gafi.org/" FATF as an individual who is or has been entrusted with a prominent public function.

form.question: Does any government or government agency own an interest or exert control over Company?

child_questions.question: What is the extent of this interest/level of control?

form.question: Does Company make facilitation payments in relation to the service(s)? i.e. unofficial payments to facilitate or expedite routine action by public officials.
Has Company ever been prosecuted or investigated for bribery or corruption related offences in any country?
Does Company have an Anti-Bribery and Corruption programme in place?
form.prompt: Please provide copies of any relevant Policies or Codes.

form.question: Does Company provide training to staff on Anti-Bribery and Corruption?
